content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <catalog name="THREDDS Master Catalog"         xmlns="http://www.unidata.ucar.edu/namespaces/thredds/InvCatalog/v1.0"         xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">      <!-- ************************************************************************************* -->     <!--                     Don't Change The Service Description!                             -->      <service name="OPeNDAP-Hyrax" serviceType="OPeNDAP" base="/opendap/"/>     <service name="WCS" serviceType="OPeNDAP" base="/opendap/wcs_service/"/>      <!-- ************************************************************************************* -->        <!--   -    -    -    -    -   -   -   -             This one doesn't work in Hyrax with           THREDDS 3.16. It produxes a correct           catalog.xml response but in the           catalog.html response the link           points to another servlet.            <catalogRef xlink:href="http://motherlode.ucar.edu:8080/thredds/catalog.xml" xlink:title="Motherlode, UNIDATA" name="Motherlode_UNIDATA" />        -    -    -    -    -    -    -    -   -->         <datasetScan location="/bes/data" path="data" name="Localhost Data Archive" serviceName="OPeNDAP-Hyrax">          <metadata inherited="true">             <authority>opendap.org</authority>         </metadata>                   <crawlableDatasetImpl className="opendap.bes.BESCrawlableDataset" />         <filter>             <exclude wildcard=".*" atomic="true" collection="true"/>             <include wildcard="*"/>         </filter>         <addDatasetSize />       </datasetScan>           <dataset name="fnoc1.nc"              urlPath="data/nc/fnoc1.nc"              ID="fnoc1.nc" >         <serviceName>OPeNDAP-Hyrax</serviceName>     </dataset>      <dataset ID="nwAtlantic1KmDec" name="AVHRR Pathfinder Declouded SST, Northwest Atlantic, 1 km" urlPath="Pathfinder/Northwest_Atlantic/1km/declouded/2000/f00004075935.hdf" collectionType="TimeSeries">     <serviceName>OPeNDAP-Hyrax</serviceName>     <metadata inherited="true">         <documentation type="summary"> The University of Rhode Island's Graduate School of Oceanography (GSO), with funding from NASA, has navigated and processed all 5-channel AVHRR passes obtained from the Wallops Island receiving station for the period 1985-2001.  These data have been processed at full 1.1 km resolution, the highest possible for a regional AVHHR data set.  The coverage area for these passes is the Northwest Atlantic, which makes them an ideal time series for Gulf Stream studies.  Following remapping to a common projection, the multi-image URI cloud screening program was applied to the data stream.              </documentation>         <keyword>Sea Surface Temperature</keyword>         <variables vocabulary="Dataset (primary variable = = long name)">             <variable name="dsp_band_1" vocabulary_name="Temperature"/>         </variables>         <variables vocabulary="Project - CF(subset)" xlink:href="http://satdat1.gso.uri.edu:80/thredds/cataloggen/catalogs/projectcf.html">             <variable name="dsp_band_1" vocabulary_name="sea_surface_temperature" units="deg C"/>         </variables>         <creator>             <name vocabulary="DIF">URI/GSO > URI Graduate School of Oceanography</name>             <contact url="http://www.gso.uri.edu" email="pcornillon@gso.uri.edu"/>         </creator>         <property name="Orbit" value="sun-synchronous"/>         <property name="Projection" value="equal angle grid"/>         <property name="Temporal" value="time series"/>         <property name="Data Source" value="observational"/>         <geospatialCoverage>             <northsouth>                 <start>5</start>                 <size>66</size>                 <resolution>1.1</resolution>                 <units>km</units>             </northsouth>             <eastwest>                 <start>-112</start>                 <size>84</size>                 <resolution>1.1</resolution>                 <units>km</units>             </eastwest>         </geospatialCoverage>         <timeCoverage>             <start>473623638 seconds since 1970-1-1 0:0:0</start>             <end>987018422 seconds since 1970-1-1 0:0:0</end>         </timeCoverage>     </metadata>     </dataset> name="HogWaller" />           <catalogRef xlink:href="MultiDirWcs/catalog.xml" xlink:title="MultiDir WCS" name="MultiDir WCS" />     <catalogRef xlink:href="SingleDirWcs/catalog.xml" xlink:title="SingleDir WCS" name="SingleDirWcs WCS" />       <dataset name="SingleFileWcs" ID="SingleFileWcs">         <serviceName>TestFlag</serviceName>          <dataset name="DataFed NetCDF" ID="DataFed NetCDF">                          <dataset name="BCEXTTAU-INTEX.Black.Carbon.Aerosol"                      urlPath="375fb0cd-da02-4a02-aad7881723988-4b64dc4d9720"                      ID="375fb0cd-da02-4a02-aad7881723988-4b64dc4d9720" >                 <property name="wcs-request" value="http://webapps.datafed.net/ogc_NASA.wsfl?SERVICE=WCS&REQUEST=GetCoverage&VERSION=1.0.0&CRS=EPSG:4326&COVERAGE=GOCART_G_OL.BCEXTTAU&TIME=2007-06-24T23:00:00&BBOX=-180,-90,180,90,0,0&WIDTH=-1&HEIGHT=-1&DEPTH=-1&FORMAT=NetCDF" />                 <property name="returnType" value="netCDF" />                 <property name="cacheTime" value="600" />                 <serviceName>OPeNDAP-Hyrax</serviceName>
